name: Acid Reflux
description: Toxolotl draws from the Toxic essence of Xolot, moderately damaging and Poisoning the whole team for 2 turns.

name: Allergic Spread
description: A burst of allergen spores that inflicts damage to the whole team.

name: Antitoxins
description: Advanced antitoxins that cure Poison on the inoculated target.

name: Aqua Bullet Hell
description: A devastating Water technique developed by legendary tamer Dan Maku.

name: Aqua Stone
description: "An ingenious application of hydraulic pressure for ballistic purposes" - Sophia d'Arissola.

name: Aquatic Whirlwind
description: This Water technique is faster than an angry Kalabyss.

name: Awful Song
description: Ninety-nine Temesseeeence viaaaals! This horrible Tucmani drinking song does considerable damage (especially to the eardrums!).

name: Bamboozle
description: Give'em the old razzle dazzle! The target gets Evading for 2 turns.

name: Bark Shield
description: Omninenesian Temtem use pieces of Banyan bark as shields, giving the whole team DEF .

name: Base Jump
description: IT's not the jump that hurts, it's the landing - and it hurts the target A LOT.

name: Bestial Charge
description: A primal charge, like the stampede on the Kisiwa plains! It inflicts damage on the whole team.

name: Beta Burst
description: A mighty beta-wave surge that bombards the target with a subatomic fusillade.

name: Blizzard
description: Cold and furious like the mistral winds in the Thalassian Cliffs.

name: Block
description: Thou shall not pass! A Melee technique that confers DEF .

name: Boomerang
description: "Originated as an Omninesian technique to reach hanging fruit in the jungle canopy."

name: Brace
description: Survival is often the greatest of victories. Only effective if the Temtem is already alerted, and gives for 2 turns.

name: Bubbles
description: Bubbles! <3 This weakens the target by means of extreme cuteness.

name: Burrow
description: "In a hole in the ground there lived a Temtem..." which allowed it to evade for 4 turns.

name: Bush
description: When in doubt, run and shout! This fast Nature technique helps your Temtem regenerate for 2 turns and evade for 1 turn.

name: Cage
description: In you go, Nick! Everyone on the battlefield gets Trapped for 2 turns.

name: Chain Heal
description: Healing is a collective process - in clockwise order, 3 Temtem recover 20% health.

name: Chain Lightning
description: This miracle of Electric manipulation bounces 3 times clockwise, dealing decreasing damage.

name: Chains Hit
description: A Neutral technique that whips the opponent with heavy chains.

name: Charge
description: There's a time for cunning strategy, and there's a time for charging head-on. This is for the latter case.

name: Cheer Up
description: Lifts the spirits of the target and gives -1 Hold.

name: Clay Ball
description: Mudslinging to see what sticks? Just a little Earth damage, probably...

name: Clinch
description: Give me a hug, bro! Ouch... but... not... like... thaaat...

name: Cold Breeze
description: A shivery draft that deals light damage and chills the target with Cold for 3 turns.

name: Confiscate
description: Gimme all your stuff! The target is Seized for 3 turns.

name: Cooperation
description: Team equality! This equalizes all team members' STA with the team average.

name: Crystal Bite
description: What do Crystal Temtem eat? Surely not other Temtem... but they can still take a vicious bite.

name: Crystal Dust
description: A miniature version of the "star-rain" that is said to have spawned the Archipelago.

name: Crystal Plume Gatling
description: What's more damaging than a feather gatling? Well, a Crystal shard gatling! Worse than a broken mirror!

name: Crystal Spikes
description: This nana-Anak analogue tectonic effect causes crystal shards to extrude from the ground and do damage.

name: Crystallize
description: Inspired by the ruins of the Amethyst Barrens, this crystal crust provides protection at the expense of speed: DEF but SPD.

name: Darkness
description: Where is everybody? All Temtem in the battlefield are Isolated for 2 turns, negating any synergies.

name: Data Burst
description: Currently, Data Burst is unavailable, so its unknown what it's description is.

name: DC Beam
description: Lightning, an elemental force; not extremely powerful, but always reliable.

name: Diamond Fort
description: Harder than the hardest Crystal Temtem! It confers DEF and SPDEF .

name: Dim Mak
description: An accurate strike at the target's main pressure point, ignoring its defenses to deal exactly 80 damage.

name: Double Edge
description: Cuts both ways, in true Neutral fashion - inflicts moderate damage to the target, but also gives it DEF and SPDEF.

name: Double Gash
description: "Tis but a scratch! Or two!". This Melee Technique is nothing to write home about.

name: Double Kick
description: An effective and cool-looking double kick inspired by Cipanki action movies.

name: Drill Impact
description: Nothing does armor piercing damage like a drill to the head.

name: Drought
description: A bone-dry technique that leaves every Temtem on the battlefield for 2 turns, and the attacker overextended next turn.

name: Dust Vortex
description: This technique buffs the enemy with the fury of the fiercest Kisiwan sandstorm.

name: Earth Wave
description: Feel the Earth shake under your feet, rising with Anak-like force - slow, but devastating for the whole team.

name: Earthbreaker

synergyEffects.effect: +30 Base Damage Becomes Electric+ 2 turns Seized

description: Myrisles engineers hate this odd trick! Make the Earth shake and deal massive damage to the target

name: Electric Storm
description: True Electric storm like the monsoon over Cipanku. Damages whole team.

name: Electromagnitism
description: Currently, Electromagnitism is unobtainable, so it's unknown what its description is.

name: Electropunch
description: Currently, Electropunch is unobtainable, so it's unknown what its description is.

name: Embers
description: Shower your opponent in burning embers. Fire technique that burns for 1 turn.

name: Energy Manipulation
description: A simple yet quick Mental attack that exhausts the target for 1 turn.

name: Execution
description: "Omnes vulnerant, postuma necat". Slowly the hour creeps onwards... it does only slight damage, but if that leaves the Temtem under 40% of their total HP... it's over for them.

name: Extinction
description: "Look up! See that cool meteorite... Extinction gives 4 turns of Doomed to everyone on the battlefield."

name: Extra Energy Slam
description: Currently, Extra Energy Slam is unavailable, so it's unknown what its description is.

name: Feather Gatling
description: "Even the softest feather becomes a sword if the hand is true." - Miyako proverb.

name: Fierce Claw
description: Raw as untamed Temtem and unstoppable as a Kisiwan stampede.

name: Finbeat
description: Also known as "siren slap". Hurts your pride more than anything else.

name: Fire Flame
description: Blazing like the depths of Anak, this flame geyser scorches your enemies.

name: Fire Tornado
description: Unleash a mighty Fire storm against your opponents. Try to wear nothing flammable...

name: Firewall
description: Currently, Firewall is unavailable, so it is unknown what it's description is.

name: Flaming Meteorite
description: Some Temtem can call on Highabove forces to bring down a fiery fire inferno on one enemy.

name: Flood
description: Watch the opponent get all bogged down. The whole team gets SPD .

name: Footwork
description: Advanced balance training developed by Tucmani rockhoppers: it confers SPD .

name: Frond Whip
description: Feel the true force of Nature, unleashed as a savage lash of the whip!

name: Gaia
description: Invoke the ancient spirit of the Omninesian jungle to recover 100% STA.

name: Gamma Burst
description: Exhausts the target for 2 turns.

name: Glass Blade
description: Like death by a thousand cuts... but this is just one of them.

name: Goring
description: You mess with the horns, you get the... No, wait! This fast, Neutral technique does serious damage.

name: Haito Uchi
description: A slashing open-hand strike in the Cipanki martial arts tradition. Inflicts Physical damage and leaves them Asleep the same turn.

name: Hallucination
description: Suggestive and Toxic visions that exhaust the mind and tire and trap the target for 2 turns.

name: Harmful Lick
description: Some Temtem lick you to signify affection... and some use it as a powerful attack! Eww!

name: Head Charge
description: There are many clever uses for a large skull. This is not one of them, but it's effective.

name: Head Ram
description: Use your head, non-metaphorically.

name: Heat Up
description: Hey, I'm still warming up! ATK.

name: Heavy Blow
description: Effective and unsubtle, like a Tucmani mine drill.

name: Held Anger
description: All that suppressed rage keeps building up... until it bursts in a nova of wrath.

name: Hellfire
description: Hell hath no fury like a tamer scorned - and this one does serious Fire damage to a whole team.

name: Hibernate
description: Just a little nap while it's cold outside... The target is for 3 turns but recovers 50% of health and stamina.

name: High-pressure Water
description: An industrial-grade water jet that packs real punch.

name: Hook Kick
description: Very few Temtem are still kicking after receiving this kick!

name: Humiliating Slap
description: A bruised ego hurts more than a wounded body. This is just the thing! DEF .

name: Hyperkinetic Strike
description: When you gotta hit hard and fast - the faster, the harder. Inflicts extra damage depending on the Temtem's SPD.

name: Hypnosis
description: A brain hack developed by Arburian Mind specialists that makes the target Asleep for 2 turns.

name: Hypoxia
description: Watch your enemies choke as you turn around and... take their breath away.

name: Ice Cubes
description: An extreme version of the ice water bucket challenge that does real damage.

name: Ice Shuriken
description: An obscure technique created by the secretive Iwaba clan, deep in the Cipanki hills, Cold for 2 turns.

name: Iced Stalactite
description: Cold *does* bother you anyway... This giant icicle inflicts damage and also Cold for 3 turns.

name: Inner Spirit
description: It is said this attack channels the spirit of a long-lost, draconic variety of Temtem, for massive damage.

name: Intimidation
description: That "don't mess with me" look makes the target team exhausted for 1 turn.

name: Jaw Strike
description: Temtem with powerful jaws always know how to use them...

name: Kick
description: Primal and instinctive, sometimes a good kick is all you need.

name: King's Roar
description: When the king roars, the rest run away. Decreases SPD and ATK of the other team.

name: Late Torment
description: Currently, Late Torment is unavailable, so it's unknown what its description is.

name: Lifeful Sap
description: The sap of life, from the living heart of the Giant Banyan. Heals 10% HP for 7 turns.

name: Look out
description: This Temtem has (metaphorical) eyes on the back of its head. This hyperalert state makes it alerted for 5 turns.

name: Lullaby
description: Twinkle twinkle little Tem /Whole opponent team falls Asleep for 2 turns.

name: Madness Buff
description: There is an edge to this madness - those willing to take 30% Damage will get SPDEF and SPATK.

name: Magma Cannon
description: Like a surge of Anak lava to the face! Fire technique that burns for 3 turns.

name: Major Slash
description: This blow targets the enemy's weak spot for massive damage.

name: Martial Strike
description: Many Melee Temtem are trained to perform this basic but effective technique.

name: Mechanical Heat
description: Currently, Mechanical Heat is unavailable, so its unknowns what it's description is.

name: Meditation
description: Sync your breathing, become more aware of the space around you, feel your body and mind get Vigorized for 3 turns...

name: Metabolize
description: This metabolic enhancement reacts to poison in the target's body by purging it and the caster recovers 15% of health.

name: Meteor Swarm
description: Death from above... A barrage of flaming meteorites that inflicts Fire damage on the whole team.

name: Mineral Hail
description: Imagine a Crystal storm in the darkest depths of Mictlan... Now just watch the enemy team.

name: Mirror Shell
description: "Mirror, mirror in my hand, who's the best tamer in the Archipelago?" "No idea, but you get SPDEF".

name: Misogi
description: The monks of Miyako developed this technique to eliminate all altered states on the Temtem.

name: Mud Shower
description: Some of the larger Temtem of the savannah love this Earth technique, as messy as it is fun!

name: Multiple Pecks
description: A rapid-fire flurry of furious beaks.

name: Nagaise's Fury
description: lä, lä! Nagaise is calling some Water friends from the deeps... The whole enemy team will regret this.

name: Narcoleptic Hit
description: A potent attack that exhausts the attacker's psyche, making it Asleep for 2 turns.

name: Nibble
description: Many Temtem have this habit of gently chewing plants and furniture. This is a little less gentle.

name: Nicho Sai
description: This basic strike for sai delivers a powerful Melee technique.

name: Nimble
description: Through rigorous training, Temtem can become extra fast and gain SPD .

name: Ninja Jutsu
description: The secret arts of the Cipanku shinobi! This technique lets you backstab enemies in the blink of an eye.

name: Nito Seiho
description: Derived from Cipanki martial traditions, this technique deals a powerful Melee strike.

name: Novice Punch
description: Just one step above a slap, but everybody's got to start somewhere.

name: Noxious Bomb
description: This nasty stinker inflicts Toxic damage... Just don't use it in an elevator...

name: Oshi-Dashi
description: Going for the ring out can be a dangerous Melee move in the smallest islands.

name: Paralyzing Poison
description: This strong venom traps and poisons the target for 2 turns.

name: Peck
description: All beaked Temtems like to playfully peck their tamers. This is the less friendly version.

name: Perfect Jab
description: Strike smarter, not harder. Weak, but enemy get DEF.

name: Petrify
description: Have a heart... of stone. It doesn't hurt much, but it leaves enemies for 5 turns.

name: Photosynthesis
description: Nature Temtem are unique in their use of Pan-sunlight to nourish themselves and recover 50% STA.

name: Pickpocket
description: A dirty trick from the seedier alleys of Lochburg, uses nimble fingers (or claws) to Seize the target for 2 turns.

name: Piercing Wheel
description: Zizare's signature technique - a fast attack that terrifies enemies DEF and lifts your spirits, giving you Vigor for 2 turns.

name: Plague
description: A nasty lurgy that damages the target and leaves it Exhausted for 1 turn.

name: Pollution
description: Noxious fumes, almost unheard-of in the unspoilt Archipelago. They Poison the whole team for 2 turns.

name: Psy Surge
description: An enhanced version of Psy that inflicts so much psychological damage that it bleeds into the somatic.

name: Psy Wave
description: "Mens sana in corpore sano"... but the other way around.

name: Psychic Collaborator
description: This {{type|mental|20|n0}Mental technique does a meager 1 damage... It's all in your mind, after all.

name: Psychosis
description: Inflicts Doom for 4 turns.

name: Quartz Shield
description: Temtem found defensive uses for rock crystal centuries before humans did: DEF and SPDEF.

name: Quicksand
description: Can we all sink any lower? Every Temtem on the battlefield gets SPD.

name: Rage
description: The red mist makes a Temtem brutal but also careless, getting ATK and DEF .

name: Rampage
description: Temtem might be cute... but when they go on a Rampage, they inflict damage on the whole team.

name: Relax
description: Time for a little siesta! Everyone on the battlefield gets Asleep for 2 turns.

name: Rend
description: While this technique does only moderate damage, it Nullifies the target for 4 turns, buying you some precious time...

name: Resin Trap
description: Like a mosquito in amber, this technique damages an enemy and leaves it trapped for 2 turns.

name: Revitalize
description: Antiseptic and a couple of bandages. Target recovers 25% HP.

name: Roar
description: A mighty roar at a crucial moment, to intimidate rivals for ATK .

name: Rockfall
description: Avalanche! The whole enemy team is bombarded with rocky debris for massive damage.

name: Roots
description: Legends tell of the Omninesian tamers who would root rivals in place, inflicting SPD .

name: Sacrifice
description: Temtem may pay the ultimate price to heal the target of all Status conditions and give them DEF and SPDEF .

name: Sand Splatter
description: A fistful of humble sand becomes a faceful of dirty fighting.

name: Sand Storm
description: Developed by the legendary tamer Da-Rud in ancient times, this Earth technique inflicts decent damage on the whole team.

name: Savage Suplex
description: In classic Temtem wresting showbiz style, this Neutral technique damages and the target for 2 turns.

name: Scratch
description: Almost any claw or nail can scratch the surface. Sometimes that's enough.

name: Seismunch's Wreck
description: Seismunch has exactly the balls to deal with the whole enemy team... Earth balls, that is.

name: Serbatiyo's Wrath
description: Only Oceara can tap into the immense power of the mythical serbatiyo to unleash a devastating Water attack on the whole enemy team.

name: Sharp Leaf
description: Evolution has armed Nature Temtem with advanced defenses against herbivores.

name: Sharp Rain
description: Rather like snow, if snow was razor-sharp ice needles instead of gentle flakes.

name: Sharp Stabs
description: Like winter in the Kilima peaks, this blizzard of sharp shards is as fast as piercing.

name: Shelter
description: Take cover! This slow technique gives DEF and SPDEF at the expense of leaving you Overexerted on the next turn.

name: Show Off
description: A good Melee fighter is a always a good showman: ATK .

name: Shrill Voice
description: Widely used by Accademia teachers, this Neutral attack deafens the whole class... eh, team.

name: Shy Shield
description: Some Temtem are naturally introverted and keep to themselves, obtaining DEF .

name: Slime
description: Nothing slows you down like being swamped in sticky goo... Traps for 2 turns and gives SPD

name: Sludge Gift
description: An extremely weak Earth technique... but you don't look a sludge gift in the rock, right?

name: Smoldering Kiss
description: Ah, the crazy Fire of passion! The target gets just a little scorched, but the kisser is invigorated for 2 turns.

name: Sparks
description: Nothing perks you up like a spark-up! SPATK.

name: Spores
description: One of the most basic Nature attacks, based on allergenic spores.

name: Stampede
description: A stampede worth of the Kisiwan savanna. Damages the whole team.

name: Stare
description: This Temtem's intimidating stare gives the Temtem Alert for 2 turns, and makes rivals feel more vulnerable: DEF .

name: Sting
description: A tiny prick only hurts a little... until they notice they're for 2 turns.

name: Stone Ball
description: The bane of exploring archaeologists, this is a mighty Earth technique.

name: Stone Wall
description: The best way to stonewall a Temtem, giving DEF and SPDEF.

name: Strangle
description: Strangler and strangled, united in a deadly embrace. Both attacker and target lose their next turn as long as they are present in the field, while the attacker not asleep.

name: Tail Strike
description: Sweep the board at one fell swoop.

name: Telekinetic Shrapnel
description: Reportedly feels "like combing your brain with concertina wire."

name: Tenderness
description: Really? Are you going to attack something *this* cute? Inflicts ATK .

name: Tentacle Whip
description: Tentacles. Why did it have to be tentacles?

name: Tesla Prison
description: An electromagnetic trap that does light damage and slows down the target: SPD.

name: Thunder Strike
description: Hear it roar! The sound and fury of this technique inflict heavy damage but Exhaust the attacker for 2 turns.

name: Time Split
description: Twist the fabric of time-space to your advantage, gaining SPD and giving the enemy SPD .

name: Tornado
description: A powerful wind technique, illegal to use near all airship terminals of the Archipelago.

name: Tortenite's Garden
description: Lil' Tort just wanted to play in its garden... but it won't suffer intruders! You heal 8% while the target is Doomed for 4 turns.

name: Toughen
description: When the going gets tough, the tough get going - and DEF!

name: Toxic Fang
description: A quick nibble that doesn't look like much... until you notice the Poison for 1 turn.

name: Toxic Gas
description: Hold your nose when you unleash this Toxic attack on the whole team.

name: Toxic Ink
description: The victim will have time to regret getting this tattoo... While it's Poisoned for 2 turns.

name: Toxic Plume
description: Like a faulty airship engine, this Temtem can leave a trail of toxic gas that gives Poison to the whole team for 1 turn.

name: Toxic Slime
description: This takes the form of a repulsive wave of slime that hurts the body... and your self-esteem.

name: Toxic Spores
description: Toxin-carrying spores that inoculate with Poisoned Condition for 3 turns.

name: Toxin Shower
description: "Toxinestorm" isn't as colorful as the alternative, but you get the idea... Slightly damages all Temtem in the battlefield.

name: Tsunami
description: "Summon a rarely seen tidal wave that damages a whole team."

name: Turbo Attack
description: Currently, Turbo Attack is unavailable, so its unknown what it's description is.

name: Turbo Charge
description: Turn it to eleven! Decreases the Hold level of our whole team.

name: Turbo Choreography
description: The ancestral dance of Deniz is a powerful ritual that bestows protection, SPD to the whole team.

name: Untangle
description: With a few swift movement, this technique Untraps the target from any tangle.

name: Uppercut
description: Melee Temtem are all about raw strength. This technique is its sincerest expression.

name: Urushiol
description: The substance known as Urushiol is a virulent toxic agent.

name: Venom Spread
description: This technique only works on already poisoned enemies - but in that case, the toxin rush inflicts 150 damage.

name: Venomous Claws
description: When the look of your claws doesn't prevent the fight, the poison finishes it.

name: Wake Up
description: "Wake up and smell the coffee! Inflicts minimal damage but wakes up the target instantly."

name: Warm Cuddle
description: Some Temtem are so warm and cuddly that they can weaponize that love into a Fire technique.

name: Water Blade
description: Whipping seawater, like the stormy Sillaro lashing at the cliffs.

name: Water Cannon
description: The strongest Sillaro current has nothing on this unstoppable jet.

name: Water Cutting Lily
description: As pretty than Denizan Water lilies... but much deadlier.

name: Waterjet
description: About time your enemies took a shower! This pressurized jet inflicts considerable damage and leaves the target Cold for 2 turns.

name: Willpower Drain
description: Sapping the very will to fight from an enemy's mind, this quick Neutral technique steals 23 Stamina points.

name: Wind Blade
description: Lashing gales, like the frozen tramontane howling over Loch.

name: Wind Burst
description: A terrifying gust of wind, capable of throwing a small airship off-course.
